description: Attributes of a request to the DiSSCo PID API to create a FDO Record for a source system

pidIssuer.description: In case of a DOI this is a PID for the DOI Registration Agency

issuedForAgent.description: In the case of a digital specimen, this is a PID for DiSSCo as the agent responsible for serving the digital specimen object

structuralType.description: Nature of the digital object, compatible with DOI schema requirements. The nature of a digital specimen object is always "digital". Other digital objects (outside DiSSCo) could be of physical, performance or abstraction nature.

locations.description: Additional URLs to be appended to the 10320/loc field
